Room.Name: Taragon Road
Room.ShortDescription: Taragon Road continues to the north and south.
Room.LongDescription: This is a rather desolate area of the village with a great many boarded up houses and shops. A sign on one of the shop doors, which looks as though it has been closed for a long time, says, "Beware the Red Fever." A sign on the shop next door says, "This place for sale. Cheap." The road you are on is not far from southeast corner of the village.
